termsOfUse.title: Terms and conditions of use
termsOfUse.description: See the general terms of use of Oblyk, the climbing community website : our privacy policy and our legal notice

about.title: About Oblyk
about.description: Learn more about Oblyk, why and who is behind the project

aboutPartner.title: Search for a climbing partner, how does it work?
aboutPartner.description: The climbing partner search allows you to find climbers around you who are also looking for people to climb with. How does it work?

helps.title: Help, how to use Oblyk
helps.description: With this short tutorial, learn how to use Oblyk in a few clicks, and take advantage of the tools of the climbers' community site

supportUs.title: Support Oblyk, make a donation
supportUs.description: Support the development of Oblyk so that it can continue to evolve

contact.title: Contact the Oblyk team
contact.description: For any question, any proposal, or simply to help us, do not hesitate to contact us!

reportProblem.title: Report a problem
reportProblem.description: Have you found a problem? Tell us so we can fix it

grade.title: Grades on oblyk
grade.description: Oblyk allows several notations for scoring and a color code is associated with a difficulty, here is how it works

glossary.title: Glossary of climbing terms
glossary.description: The community lexicon of climbing terms to decode the climber's language

home.title: Oblyk - Climbing community, Log book & Partner search
home.description: Oblyk is an outdoor and indoor climbing community site, you can: see crag information, keep a logbook, find a climbing partner, etc.

oblyk.title: Oblyk - Climbing community, Log book & Partner search
oblyk.description: Oblyk is an outdoor and indoor climbing community site, you can: see crag information, keep a logbook, find a climbing partner, etc.

crag.title: %{name}, climb in %{region}
crag.description: %{name} : climbing crag in %{city} in %{region}. Details of the routes, location, guide books, photos, etc.

area.title: %{name}, climbing crags group
area.description: See the summary of the group of climbing sites of %{name}, what kind of climbing spots it offers or what variety of grades can be found there
